name: nyc.scatter.depthkit.core.vfx
description:
Use the Depthkit Core Visual Effect Graph Package to provide Depthkit captures from Depthkit Core and Depthkit Cinema as the input to particle systems built with Unityâ€™s Visual Effect Graph.

Note that the Unity Visual Effect graph is only officially compatible with Scriptable Render Pipelines such as HDRP and URP, and is not officially supported in the legacy Built-in RP.

Note you can only render single-perspective captures with the Depthkit Core packages. For multi-perspective captures, use Depthkit Studio package suite.

samples.displayName: Prefabs - Depthkit Core Visual Effect Graph
samples.description: Prefabs for the Depthkit Core Visual Effect Graph
